price: Dájúdájú ìdìde kírun lóru, ó wọnú ọkàn jùlọ, ó sì dára jùlọ fún kíké (al-Ƙur’ān).
arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna nāshi-ata al-layli hiya ashaddu waṭan wa-aqwamu qīlan
